scripts.docker:deploy: npm run docker:build && docker stop fontello-server ; docker rm fontello-server ; npm run docker:run
scripts.docker:run: docker run -d --restart=always -e CORS=true -p 2016:2016 -p 2017:2017 -e DB_PATH=/opt/fontellodb -v /opt/fontellodb:/opt/fontellodb --name fontello-server fontello-server
scripts.docker:update: npm run docker:build && docker kill fontello-server ; docker rm fontello-server ; npm run docker:run
